Detailed Description

A looping transport allows play / pause, looping , seeking capabilities for a sequence or track.

◆ set_looping()

virtual void medimuse::ILoopingTransport::set_looping ( bool  looping)
pure virtual

set the transport looping flag. Looping is not generally used for statesong but this is included for compatibility for other applications

Parameters
loopingset to true it is looping , false it is not looping

◆ set_tempo()

virtual void medimuse::ILoopingTransport::set_tempo ( double  tempo)
pure virtual

Set the main transport tempo in BPM, The tempo always is the measure of the pulse of 1 qaurter note there is no hokey pokey about assigning the tempo to different duration of notes this is common amoung most popular DAWs to assign the tempo to the quarter note

Parameters
tempothe tempo in BPM
